title: Sketchbook Folio, "Shoreline with Sailboats and House", 1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Water in foreground with shoreline at left extending back towards distance. Along shoreline in foreground and midground, three sailboats. At left, on shore in distance, a house. Additional sailboat on right in midground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Shoreline with Sailboats and House", 1902.
1902. Graphite on off-white wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-46.
